name: Morir de amor
summary: Morir de Amor is a charming little tale. It's a story that focuses on two caged parrots reminiscing of memories past as their owner sleeps nearby. A rather important memory that the owner was not privy to. While the beginning starts out rather ho hum it quickly recovers with its quirky charm, humor, and rather subtly becomes rather poignant as the story nears completion.
info:
• 中文名: 爱的消亡
  • 别名: Dying of Love
  • 上映年度: 2005-10-05
  • 片长: 12:09
  • 制片国家/地区: 德国
  • 语言: 法语
  • 导演: Gil Alkabetz
  • 编剧: Gil Alkabetz
